info.female_impression: Burnice sure makes delicious drinks! No wonder she's famous in the Outer Ring.
info.male_impression: Yeah, so long as we don't try her blends for Steeltusk.
info.outlook_desc:
There's no record of Burnice in the New Eridu Citizen Verification Profile.
Note: Burnice has a good Aptitude for Ether
info.profile_desc:
Burnice, the Nitro-Fuel bartender for the Sons of Calydon.
A hopeless fuel lover. She is responsible for all the fuel used by the machinery owned by the Sons of Calydon.
She seems to have a passion for fuel that overwhelms all else.

Burnice is super outgoing, friendly, and carefree.
She is easily able to spread her emotions to the people around her, bringing them the same optimism she possesses.
"You like the drinks I mix? Thank you! Steeltusk does, too~ That big guy can drink two hundred liters in one go!"
"Do you wanna try its special fuel blend? It's suuuuper hot!"
unlock_conditions: Complete Main Story "Leisurely Lull: Unexpected New Customer" (available after completing Main Story Chapter 4) to unlock

mindscape_cinemas.name: Kindred Flames
mindscape_cinemas.description: Increases the limit of Heat from 100 to 140. Upon entering the battlefield, Burnice accumulates an additional 40 Heat. Increases the DMG Multiplier of the Afterburn effect by 100% of Burnice's ATK. Additionally, the accumulated Fire Anomaly Buildup from the Afterburn effect is increased by 25%.
mindscape_cinemas.description2:
"Everyone has rough times; it's perfectly normal!"
"Cheer up, Caesar! How about a Nitro-Fuel special? I added a ton of sugar!"

mindscape_cinemas.name: Extra at No Additional Charge
mindscape_cinemas.description: When triggering the Afterburn effect, Thermal Penetration is applied to the enemy, stacking up to 5 times and lasting 6s. Repeated triggers reset the duration. When any allied unit in the squad hits the enemy, the attack's PEN Ratio is increased by 4% for each stack of Thermal Penetration, up to a max of 20%.
mindscape_cinemas.description2:
As the mixologist for the Sons of Calydon, Burnice takes great pleasure in crafting the best Nitro-Fuel drinks in New Eridu for her friends.
Of course, if you happen to be her enemy... you might have the opportunity to try a new and unique flavor too.
"It's a once-in-a-lifetime, absolutely exquisite taste!"

mindscape_cinemas.name: Optimistic by Nature
mindscape_cinemas.description: Basic Attack, Dodge, Assist, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2
mindscape_cinemas.description2:
"That Burnice, she's always so full of energy! Even right after waking up! I have no idea where she gets all that energy..."
"What's even scarier is that she can get everyone around her to be just as enthusiastic! It's almost like she's some kind of monster!"
"But... I don't really dislike it, to be honest..."
— From a boar manager who wishes to remain unnamed

mindscape_cinemas.name: Ultimate Fuel Supply
mindscape_cinemas.description: When an EX Special Attack or Assist Attack hits an enemy, the move's CRIT Rate increases by 30%. The max flame spray duration of EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot is increased by 1s.
mindscape_cinemas.description2:
"You like the drink I mixed? Thanks! Steeltusk likes them too~ That guy can drink 200 liters in one go!"
"Oh, Steeltusk is our big truck!"
"Wanna try some of its special fuel? It's pretty fiery~"

mindscape_cinemas.name: Dance of Fire and Ice
mindscape_cinemas.description: Basic Attack, Dodge, Assist, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2
mindscape_cinemas.description2:
When mixing drinks, ice is a crucial element.
Without an intense chill, the intense heat just doesn't stand out.
"That fusion of fire and ice~ It's truly captivating!"

mindscape_cinemas.name: Burning Invitation
mindscape_cinemas.description: When Burnice hits an enemy with EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot, it triggers an additional special Afterburn effect, dealing 60% of Burnice's ATK as Fire DMG to the target. This effect can trigger once every 0.5s and does not consume Heat. After hitting an enemy with EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot, while the move is active, EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot, special Afterburn effects, and Burn effects will ignore 25% of the target's Fire RES. When EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot's fire blast hits an enemy, if that enemy is Burned, trigger an additional instance of Burn DMG equal to 1,800% of the original DMG. This effect can trigger once every 20s for each target.
mindscape_cinemas.description2:
It seems like no one has ever seen Burnice truly angry.
"Trust me, you don't want to see it."
— From a driver getting ready to sleep atop Steeltusk

descriptions.name: Basic Attack: Direct Flame Blend
descriptions.description:
Press  to activate:
Unleashes up to 5 attacks in front, dealing Physical DMG and Fire DMG.

descriptions.name: Basic Attack: Mixed Flame Blend
descriptions.description:
In the Nitro-Fuel Cocktail state, hold  to activate:
Spin continuously while spraying flames around, followed by a Finishing Move that inflicts Fire DMG. Continuing to hold extends the flame-spraying duration.
When the move is activated, it consumes 20 Heat;
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.
After executing the Finishing Move, press  to immediately follow up with EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot.

descriptions.name: Dodge: Fiery Phantom Dash
descriptions.description:
Press  to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

descriptions.name: Dash Attack: Dangerous Fermentation
descriptions.description:
Press  during a dodge to activate:
Perform a forward rush attack with the flamethrower, dealing Fire DMG.

descriptions.name: Dodge Counter: Fluttering Steps
descriptions.description:
Press  during a Perfect Dodge to activate:
Launch a series of attacks on enemies in front while spraying flames, dealing Physical DMG and Fire DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

descriptions.name: Special Attack: Intense Heat Aging Method
descriptions.description:
Press  to activate:
Unleash a fire blast forward, inflicting Fire DMG;
Press and hold  to charge, boosting the move's power.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

descriptions.name: EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method
descriptions.description:
With enough energy, press  to activate:
Continuously spray flames with a one-handed flamethrower, then release a fire blast in a straight line ahead, dealing massive Fire DMG. Continue holding to steadily consume energy and extend the spray's duration.
While continuously spraying, drag the stick/joystick to execute a sidestep dodge, adjusting your position in the corresponding direction.
Anti-Interrupt Level is increased while continuously spraying, and DMG taken is reduced by 40%.
Character is invulnerable during sidestep dodge and fire blast.

descriptions.name: EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot
descriptions.description:
While using EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method, with enough Energy, press  to activate:
Use both flamethrowers to continuously spray flames, followed by a fire blast in a front line, dealing massive Fire DMG. Keep holding to continue consuming Energy and extend the spray's duration.
Character is invulnerable during the moment the spray is activated and during the activation of the fire blast.
Anti-Interrupt Level is increased while spraying, and DMG received is reduced by 40%.

descriptions.name: Special Attack: Intense Heat Aging Method
EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method
EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot
Chain Attack: Fuel-Fed Flame
descriptions.description:
When a Chain Attack is triggered, select the character to activate:
Quickly dash forward while spraying flames in all directions, then launch a fire blast in a fan-shaped area ahead, dealing massive Fire DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using the skill, press  to immediately follow up with EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot.

descriptions.name: Ultimate: Glorious Inferno
descriptions.description:
When Decibel Rating is at Maximum, press  to activate:
Dash forward quickly, then leap into the air and continuously spray flames over a wide area ahead, dealing massive Fire DMG.
When leaping into the air, a Quick Assist will be triggered. If the Quick Assist is activated, Burnice will extend the duration of her flame spray.
Upon activation, recover 50 Heat.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

descriptions.name: Quick Assist: Energizing Specialty Drink
descriptions.description:
When the active character is launched, press  to activate:
Unleash a flurry of attacks on enemies in front while spraying flames, dealing Physical DMG and Fire DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

descriptions.name: Defensive Assist: Smoky Cauldron
descriptions.description:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press  to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

descriptions.name: Assist Follow-Up: Scorching Dew
descriptions.description:
Press  after a Defensive Assist to activate:
Leap into the air and quickly spin forward while spraying flames in all directions, dealing Fire DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using the skill, press  to immediately follow up with EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot.

descriptions:
When Burnice expends Energy, she accumulates Heat, up to a max of 100. She gains 1.4 Heat for each 1 point of Energy consumed. At 50 Heat, she enters the Nitro-Fuel Cocktail state until all Heat is expended. Upon entering the battlefield, Burnice instantly accumulates 100 Heat.
While in the Nitro-Fuel Cocktail state, when Burnice hits an enemy with a Basic Attack: Mixed Flame Blend, EX Special Attack, Chain Attack, or Ultimate, she applies the Scorched effect to the target until she exits the Nitro-Fuel Cocktail state. When other squad members hit enemies under the Scorched status, it triggers the Afterburn effect, expending 8 Heat to deal Fire DMG equal to 175% of Burnice's ATK and accumulate Fire Anomaly Buildup. This effect can trigger once every 1.5s. For every 10 Anomaly Proficiency, Afterburn DMG increases by 1%, up to a max of 30%. DMG from the Afterburn effect is considered Assist Attack DMG.

When another character in your squad is an Anomaly character or shares the same Faction:
When Burnice's Basic Attack: Mixed Flame Blend, EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method or EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot hits an enemy, or when the Afterburn effect is triggered, the move's accumulated Fire Anomaly Buildup increases by 65%. When any squad member applies the Burn effect to an enemy, the duration of that effect is extended by 3s.
